com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please
  • Enclosing interface:
    BleNode.ConnectionFailListener

    public static class BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please
extends Object
    Return value for BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent) and BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent). Generally you will only return retry() or doNotRetry(), but there are more advanced options as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please doNotRetry()
      Return this to stop the connection fail retry loop.
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please doNotRetryIf(boolean condition)
      Returns doNotRetry() if the given condition holds true, retry() otherwise.
      boolean isRetry()
      Returns true for everything except doNotRetry().
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retry()
      Return this to retry the connection, continuing the connection fail retry loop.
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryIf(boolean condition)
      Returns retry() if the given condition holds true, doNotRetry() otherwise.
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryWithAutoConnectFalse()
      Opposite ofretryWithAutoConnectTrue().
      static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryWithAutoConnectTrue()
      Same as retry(), but autoConnect=true will be passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • retry

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retry()
        Return this to retry the connection, continuing the connection fail retry loop. autoConnect passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback) will be false or true based on what has worked in the past, or on BleNodeConfig.alwaysUseAutoConnect.

      • retryIf

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryIf(boolean condition)
        Returns retry() if the given condition holds true, doNotRetry() otherwise.

      • doNotRetry

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please doNotRetry()
        Return this to stop the connection fail retry loop.

      • doNotRetryIf

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please doNotRetryIf(boolean condition)
        Returns doNotRetry() if the given condition holds true, retry() otherwise.

      • retryWithAutoConnectTrue

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryWithAutoConnectTrue()
        Same as retry(), but autoConnect=true will be passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback). See more discussion at BleNodeConfig.alwaysUseAutoConnect.

      • retryWithAutoConnectFalse

        public static BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please retryWithAutoConnectFalse()
        Opposite ofretryWithAutoConnectTrue().

      • isRetry

        public boolean isRetry()
        Returns true for everything except doNotRetry().
